title: Woman in Mexico dies in fall from 'Voladores' ritual pole
description: A woman performing in the picturesque “Voladores” ritual has died after falling from the 30-yard (meter) high pole in central Mexico state of Puebla

title: Valentino holds black tie Paris show, Lanvin goes simple
description: Stars such as Avril Lavigne sat beneath the gothic style arches of Lanvin’s ornate Paris venue to view the old couture house’s latest designs, which riffed subtly on history

title: A generation of Venezuelan children know only struggles
description: A generation of children in Venezuela have only known a country in crisis, plagued over the last decade or more by shortages, inflation and desperation

title: Funeral of Thai 'cave boy' who died in UK ends with prayers
description: Mourners have filled a temple chamber for a final prayer session in northern Thailand for one of the 12 boys rescued from a flooded cave in 2018 who died at school in England last month

title: Egypt's leader, visiting Iraqi premier seek to deepen ties
description: Egypt’s President Abdel Fattah el-Sissi has met with Iraq’s prime minister in Cairo as the two countries seek to deepen their ties and reinforce a regional alliance with Jordan

title: Ukrainian forces cling to Bakhmut as Russia attacks from three sides
description: With the city in the eastern Donetsk region nearly destroyed, Ukrainian troops were fighting back against a continuing onslaught led by Rusriessia's Wagner mercenaries.

title: Fire hits crowded Rohingya refugee camp in Bangladesh
description: A massive fire has raced through a crammed refugee camp for Rohingya Muslims in southern Bangladesh, leaving thousands homeless

title: Prince Harry stays silent on coronation plans amid new bombshell interview
description: Reports that Harry and Meghan were invited to King Charles' coronation come as he told psychologist Gabor Mate that he always "felt different" from his family.

title: Netanyahu calls comments to erase village 'inappropriate'
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says the remarks by a key Cabinet ally calling for a Palestinian village to be erased were inappropriate

title: 4 children die in fire in southwestern Serbia
description: Serbian police say a fire in a southwestern town has killed four children and injured their parents

title: Recycling lake litter, Ugandan makes innovative tourist boat
description: Africa’s Lake Victoria is plagued by pollution and a decline in water levels partly due to climate change

title: Crisis over suspected Iran schoolgirl poisonings escalates
description: A crisis over suspected poisonings targeting Iranian schoolgirls is escalating as authorities now acknowledge over 50 schools had been struck in a wave of possible cases

title: Deadly shipwreck: How it happened, and unanswered questions
description: At least 70 people died in last week’s shipwreck on Italy’s Calabrian coast

title: China pledges modest economic growth of about 5% in 2023
description: The National People’s Congress opened in Beijing. China’s rubber-stamp parliament is expected to approve a government overhaul that extends Xi Jinping’s control.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Ukrainian troops hold on, with Bakhmut not encircled yet
description: The battle for the city is coming down to street-by-street fighting and skirmishes on its outskirts, where Ukrainian forces are fortifying their positions.

title: Talking to children who left Russia about the war in Ukraine
description: In Russia, academic freedom was one of the first casualties of the war against Ukraine. Schools serving Russian families abroad now face the challenge of talking to children about the war.
